title: Ticket #590: manual definition of UID_DOMAIN config knob not up to date
description: Ken points out that the current manual definition is not correct, and that there appears to be inconsistent behavior under different universes (bug?).
remarks:
2011-Dec-01 11:42:07 by smoler:
Very old ticket. Pete's leaving. Reassigning to Todd, who will further reassign the ticket as appropriate.

I went through the code and I did not find any discrepancies in the use of the UID_DOMAIN variable.

I will mark this ticket as abandoned; we can pick it up later if someone finds problems in the manual. The manual looks correct to me.
